alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Mellette; Southern Jackson; Southern Oglala Lakota; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 10:08PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT TODD...SOUTHERN MELLETTE... SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON AND BENNETT COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM MDT/MIDNIGHT CDT/... At 1007 PM MDT/1107 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles east of Littleburg to 2 miles east of Upper Cut Meat to 9 miles northwest of Merriman. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Mission, Martin, White River, Rosebud, Saint Francis, Parmelee, Allen, Okreek, Spring Creek, Long Valley, Norris, Tuthill, Wood, Cedar Butte, Mosher, Upper Cut Meat, Soldier Creek, Hisle, Black Pipe, and Harrington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Mellette; Southern Jackson; Southern Oglala Lakota; Todd
